name: WRong
description:
Try to bounce the paddle back and forth by hitting it with a ball on either side of the screen.  It's a one player game or a two player game, just depends if you have friends!  

Controls:
W-S to control the left ball
Up-Down arrow keys to control the right ball
If the controls aren't working for you try clicking in the game window.  

Upper numbers are the scores for Player 1 (left) and Player 2 (right).  
Lower numbers are the solo score (left) and high score (right).  

Enjoy!  

Assets from: https://www.mattlag.com/bitfonts/
https://www.vectorstock.com/royalty-free-vectors/w-glitch-vectors
Pong logo by Atari, obviously.
